plugins.name: Picasso AI
plugins.description:
Bring your designs to life with Picasso AI - the professional Figma plugin that creates stunning images from your words.


Just type any text prompt into Picasso AI and watch as visually rich, professional images are generated instantly. From product sketches to graphic illustrations, Picasso AI's image generation delivers creative images tailored to your description every time.


Designed specifically for UI/UX designers and product teams, Picasso AI allows you to rapidly ideate and experiment with visual concepts in Figma. Skip tedious searching for stock imagery - bring your unique ideas into view with just text.


Powered by the state of the art Stable Diffusion (SDXL) that beats Midjourney!


Key Features:


- Generate images in seconds simply by typing text prompts

- Complements your workflow without disrupting design thinking

- Produces images in diverse artistic and photographic styles

- Saves hours of searching for the right visuals


Quickly turn ideas into mockups, storyboards, prototypes and more with Picasso AI. Spark your imagination and boost productivity with AI-powered image generation for Figma.


Give your designs the perfect visuals - download Picasso AI on the Figma Plugin Marketplace today!
plugins.tagline: Fast and Simple Generative Image Plugin

plugins.name: DAI - Documentação de Acessibilidade para Interfaces
plugins.description:
O DAI é um plugin para o Figma projetado para documentar os requisitos de acessibilidade de interface para a WEB dentro do protótipo.


O DAI é um produto de um Trabalho de Conclusão de Curso (TCC) do curso de Design Digital na Universidade Federal do Ceará Campus em Quixadá. O trabalho foi construído pelo aluno George Moreno de Oliveira orientado pela professora doutora Ingrid Teixeira Monteiro, professora da UFC e pesquisadora na área da Interação Humano-computador.


O trabalho intitulado "Desenvolvimento de um plugin para documentação de acessibilidade para interfaces no Figma" está atualmente na fase de desenvolvimento do produto, o plugin, que pode ser utilizado clonando o seguinte repositório.

plugins.name: Text United for Figma
plugins.description:
Translate prototypes and designs


Design a product, website, or prototype to international audiences without the hassle. With the Text United plugin, you will be able to translate the content from your Figma design and see how your prototype will look like when localized into any language. 


What is Text United?


An end-to-end translation platform that allows marketers, designers, project managers, and developers to work collaboratively and to provide multilingual digital content and products faster and effortlessly.


With the Figma plugin, you can

  • Extract all the text from your Figma Design 
  • Machine translate instantly 
  • Create a translation project for translators from your own team 
  • Translate yourself 
  • Order professional translation service 
  • Insert translations into your design quickly, replacing the source text 


This plugin requires an active Text United paid account (14-Day Free Trial >>)


To use the plugin, you need to

  1. Launch the plugin
  2. Copy the company ID number and API key from your Text United account and paste it into the plugin settings.
  3. Select how to translate: (machine translation, outsource to Text United, or you and your team) <- not a must to add.
  4. Choose the source language of your design and select a target language.
  5. Choose how to translate: Machine Translation can be applied to the design right away. For the Me-and-My team and Professional Service projects, the translation project will need to be completed first before inserting the translations into the design. 


Once the translation is completed, you can open My Project and click on Apply Translation.


You can also find the information, including screenshots, here

plugins.name: Conditioner
plugins.description:
• Show how components in your design should look under different application conditions.

• Update all instances to depict a different application-wide condition in one click.

INSTRUCTIONS
===

Follow these instructions to make any component swappable using Conditioner.

1. Create a new component, or choose an existing component, and move it out of any parent frames so its frame is at the top level of the document, not embedded inside any other frames.

2. Name the component anything you'd like, but make sure it ends with " ? " followed by the name of the condition it represents. Example: "Header ? Anonymous" or "Navigation / Bottom Tabs ? Anonymous"

3. Place instances of the component into any places within your design you'd like it to appear.

4. Create a new conditional variation, also at the top level within the page. You can do this by duplicating the original component and changing overrides, or you can make a completely new frame with completely different content. Make the new instance or frame into a component, and name it to match the first conditional variation. Example: "Header ? Logged-in" or "Navigation / Bottom Tabs ? Logged-in"

5. Repeat step 4 for as many conditional variations you'd like to make for this component.

6. Wrap all the conditional variations together in one frame. Name the frame using the component name, followed by " ?" at the end. Example: "Header ?" or "Navigation / Bottom Tabs ?"

Repeat the process to set up as many conditionally-swappable components as you need. Run the Conditioner plugin whenever you want to swap all the conditional instances in your design from one variation to another.

EXAMPLE LAYER STRUCTURE
===

Setting up conditional components:
---
FRAME: Header ?
- COMPONENT: Header ? Anonymous
- COMPONENT: Header ? Logged-in

FRAME: Navigation / Bottom Tabs ?
- COMPONENT: Navigation / Bottom Tabs ? Anonymous
- COMPONENT: Navigation / Bottom Tabs ? Logged-in

Using conditional instances in your designs:
---
FRAME: Home
- INSTANCE: Header ? Anonymous
- (other content)
- INSTANCE: Navigation / Bottom Tabs ? Anonymous

FRAME: Notifications
- INSTANCE: Header ? Anonymous
- (other content)
- INSTANCE: Navigation / Bottom Tabs ? Anonymous

plugins.name: TokToken - Figma Design Token Extractor
plugins.description:
Toktoken is a Figma plugin designed to streamline the extraction of design tokens defined within your Figma design system.


With Toktoken, you can easily extract tokens for colors and typography and export them into a structured JSON format. This plugin enables designers and developers to maintain consistency across design and development workflows by providing a centralized source of truth for design tokens.


Simply select the desired tokens within your Figma project, and Toktoken will generate a JSON file that can be saved locally or uploaded to your github project repository.

Stay tuned for future updates, as we plan to expand the capabilities to include additional design token types.
plugins.tagline: Empower your Figma workflow with seamless design token extraction and exportation.

plugins.description:
Transform Hex Codes into Stunning Color Cards with Ease!


Our plugin is a tool that allows you to create vibrant and professional color cards from any hex code. Whether you're a designer looking for a quick way to add color pallets to your design system or canvas, this plugin is designed to meet your needs with its features and sleek design.


Key Features:


  1. Each hex code you enter is paired with a unique and creative color name

  3. Plugin adjusts the text color on the card based on contrast,

More Features Soon: Stay tuned for upcoming updates! We're continuously working new features and templates that helps you to move the hex code in to color cards in a single click.

plugins.name: Automatin
plugins.description:
Automate your tasks with the Figma JavaScript library.


How to use it?

Just write your code as if you were coding a plugin, and click on "Run code".

You can find the documentation here: https://www.figma.com/plugin-docs/api/figma/.


Why?

Instead of creating a plugin for each small automation, you can now write it directly in Figma. This means that you no longer have to:

  • create a plugin from scratch, which can be redundant
  • download the Figma Desktop app (because to use the plugin online, the moderators have to give their permission)


The project is open-source. Find the code here: https://github.com/arthur-fontaine/automatin-for-figma/.

plugins.name: LILT <> Figma Connector
plugins.description:
Embed translation directly into your design canvas with the LILT <> Figma Connector. Prototype, iterate, and optimize designs in 100+ languages to reach customers around the world:

  1. Test design spacing, layout, and format across languages
  2. Design a UX optimized for multiple languages
  3. Create smooth, accessible experiences for all global users


What is LILT?

LILT is the complete AI solution for enterprise translation, empowering organizations to scale and optimize global content.


The LILT Platform combines advanced AI technology with a human quality guarantee, ensuring unparalleled accuracy, speed, and scale. Partner with LILT to improve translation quality, automate workflows, and scale the reach of your designs.


How it Works

The LILT <> Figma Connector integrates translation into your design workflow:


  1. Design in your base language.
  2. Iterate rapidly with Instant Translation. Select frames or layers in Figma and in a matter of clicks, LILT delivers an Instant Translation from your organization’s customized, brand-specific AI models. Instantly see how text reflows, identify potential UI breaks, and experiment across languages in real-time to ensure designs are market-ready.
  3. Request publication-ready Verified Translation. For high-impact global designs, send content to LILT for quality-guaranteed translation with verification by skilled linguists.
  4. Receive and finalize in Figma. Localized content is delivered directly into your Figma file, preserving your design structure. Review across languages and publish.


Key Features & Benefits

  1. Flexible translation workflows: Choose Instant Translation for rapid prototyping or Verified Translation for final production, supporting the full design lifecycle.
  2. Accelerate time-to-market: LILT’s AI shortens delivery timelines, so you can ship global-ready designs faster.
  3. Seamless integration: Streamlined workflows and automation accelerate translation and enhance global team collaboration.
  4. Consistent global branding: LLMs are customized for your unique brand voice, ensuring consistency across all published languages.
  5. Effortless enterprise scalability: Easily translate large content volumes across 100+ languages, all within your Figma instance.


Getting Started with LILT in Figma

  1. Install: In Figma, navigate to Community > Plugins, choose LILT, and click Install.
  2. Configure: Launch the LILT plugin and navigate to Settings.
  3. Authenticate: Enter your LILT token and click “Save settings”.
  4. Design: Once configured, you are ready to send content to LILT for translation.


To use this plugin, your company must be a LILT customer.


Learn More & Support

  1. Discover how LILT empowers creative and technical teams at www.lilt.com.
  2. For more information about the LILT <> Figma Connector, visit the LILT Knowledge Base.
  3. For questions, a live demo, or to discuss how AI can be part of your global design strategy, email connect@lilt.com.

accepted.name: LILT
accepted.description: Quickly design and iterate across languages

plugins.tagline: Seamless enterprise-grade translation

plugins.name: FrameHop
plugins.description:
FrameHop allows you to quickly hop back and forth between Frames and Components.


  • Frame History: FrameHop keeps a list of your recently selected Frames, Components, Component Variants and Sections.
  • Hop Around: Click any Layer in the list to instantly jump to it. Works across Pages too!
  • Favorite Frames: Mark your favorite Frames, Components, Variants and Sections for quick access.
  • Keyboard Shortcuts: Use Figma’s Quick Action Menu to quickly hop backwards or forwards in your Frame History list.
  • FigJam Support: Works great with FigJam Sections!


Feedback and feature requests welcomed.


FrameHop.xyz
plugins.tagline: Hop between Frames and Components faster than ever

plugins.name: Layerbeam
plugins.description:
The fastest way to test spatial UI designs in VR


What can you do with Layerbeam?


🎨 Design for spatial computing platforms

  • Use familiar tools to design panel-based spatial computing apps
  • Test designs in a virtual environment or your own space using passthrough AR mode


⭐️️️️ Run Figma prototypes in Virtual Reality

  • Create clickable prototypes of Vision Pro apps, Quest Augments and XR game UIs
  • Use hands to navigate your prototype app design and reposition it in the world around you
  • *Requires Pro subscription


🛜 Pair your VR headset with ease

  • Pair with a simple 6 digit code, no need to sign in to anything in VR
  • Layerbeam forms a direct connection between computer and headset over Wi-Fi
  • WebXR-compatible headsets are supported including all Quest versions

plugins.name: Color Easily - Palette Generator
plugins.description:
Import Your Color Easily Palettes into Figma in 5 Easy Steps:

  1. Discover your new favorite color palette on coloreasily.com.
  2. Click the "Copy Link" button on the toolbar or simply copy the URL when you've found a palette you love.
  3. Paste the link into the plugin's URL input field.
  4. Click the "Generate" button.
  5. Get your Color Easily Palette and corresponding color styles imported into the project!


Features:

  • Your color palette will be displayed within an organized frame
  • Corresponding color styles will be automatically generated for each of the colors in your palette. The color styles will be named as 'text', 'background', 'accent 1', 'accent 2', 'accent 3' etc.
  • You can toggle whether you would like to update your current color styles, so you don't have to manually re-apply the new colors, or if you'd prefer to generate new color styles (default).


If you have any feature suggestions, feedback, or are experiencing any issues, let me know in the comments!

plugins.name: Segmentify
plugins.description:
AI Segment Image Fast.


A free Figma Plugin, Instantly extract elements from images into your Figma, boosting design efficiency and unleashing creative potential.


The plugin works by first extracting image embeddings using the SAM model. Then, users can add positive (foreground) and negative (background) points on the image to guide the segmentation process. The plugin then generates a mask based on these points and displays the segmented result in real-time.


Feel free to leave feedback and discuss in the comments section; I will continue to update and optimize the plugin.


For more information about the plugin, please visit the official website at https://segmentify.app/

缩放大师：Figma 动态缩放字号工具

Scale Master: Font Size Dynamic Zoom Tool for Figma


通过缩放大师，这款强大的插件，提升您的 Figma 使用体验，它设计用于轻松缩放项目中的文本和元素。凭借直观的控制和实时反馈机制，缩放大师确保设计缩放的精确性和效率。

Enhance your Figma experience with Scale Master, a powerful plugin designed to effortlessly scale text and elements across your projects. With intuitive controls and real-time feedback mechanisms, Scale Master ensures precision and efficiency in design scaling.


功能特点：

  1. 动态缩放： 通过简单的滑块控制轻松调整文本和元素大小。
  2. 实时反馈： 对缩放操作提供即时的视觉和文本反馈，确保精确性和满意度。
  3. 可自定义设置： 微调缩放参数以满足特定项目需求。
  4. 用户友好界面： 干净直观的用户界面，无缝集成到您的 Figma 工作区。

Features:

  1. Dynamic Scaling: Easily adjust text and element sizes with a simple slider control.
  2. Real-Time Feedback: Instant visual and textual feedback on scaling operations, ensuring accuracy and satisfaction.
  3. Customizable Settings: Fine-tune scaling parameters to meet specific project needs.
  4. User-Friendly Interface: A clean and straightforward UI that seamlessly integrates into your Figma workspace.


非常适合希望简化工作流程并在不同设备大小上实现一致设计结果的设计师和团队。

Perfect for designers and teams looking to streamline their workflow and achieve consistent design results across different device sizes.


立即获取缩放大师，前所未有地掌控您的设计缩放！

Get Scale Master today and take control of your design scales like never before!

manifest.name: 字号缩放工具 Font Size Scale

136409.tagline: Effortlessly scale designs to fit any screen size.

plugins.name: Vitality AI
plugins.description:
WE'RE EXCITED TO SAY THAT WE'VE RELEASED A NEW VERSION OF THIS PLUGIN, CHECK HERE, AND THIS VERSION IS NO LONGER AVAILABLE.


Introducing Vitality AI – a Figma plugin revolutionizing design creation! Generate stunning designs effortlessly with just a prompt description. From accordions to sliders, Vitality AI crafts various components to meet your design needs.


Using Vitality AI is a breeze. Simply run the plugin, wait for it to load, then describe your design and click generate. Avoid clicking elsewhere to prevent interference during the design process. Once generated, import your design into Figma with the click of a button. Need inspiration? Hit the randomize button for fresh prompts. Plus, customize import locations using the x and y coordinates.


Note: To use the plugin, users need to create a free Vitality AI account here.


Encounter an error? No worries! The plugin will notify you, or simply restart for a seamless experience. With Vitality AI, design innovation is at your fingertips.


Vitality AI includes the following components:

  1. Accordion
  2. Alert
  3. Avatar
  4. Badge
  5. Button
  6. Calendar NEW
  7. Card
  8. Checkbox
  9. Input
  10. Label
  11. Progress
  12. Radio group
  13. Select
  14. Separator
  15. Skeleton
  16. Slider
  17. Switch
  18. Tabs
  19. Textarea
plugins.tagline: Experience the Future of Design

plugins.name: Figma i18n Plugin
plugins.description:
figma-i18n-plugin

  • 국제화를 위한 Figma 플러그인
  • Figma plugin for i18n
  • 国際化のためのFigmaプラグイン

KO

  • Global Language 관리: figma page에서 사용할 언어를 추가/삭제/변경한다.
  • Apply all: 선택한 언어로 전체 Text를 변경한다.
  • Node ID: 선택한 node의 ID를 조회한다.
  • 선택한 Node의 언어를 변경할 수 있다.
  • JSON 파일로 i18n 파일을 내보내기 할 수 있다.
  • 내보내기 한 JSON파일을 import하여 i18n 적용할 수 있다.

EN

  • Global Language Management: Add/delete/change the language to be used in the figma page.
  • Apply all: Change the entire Text to the selected language.
  • Node ID: queries the ID of the selected node.
  • You can change the language of the selected node.
  • You can export i18n files to JSON files.
  • The exported JSON file can be imported and i18n applied.


본 플러그인의 로고 및 커버 이미지는 대한민국 공군의 공군 픽토그램을 이용하였으며 공내디(https://afplay2.tistory.com/)에서 무료로 다운받으실 수 있습니다. The logo and cover images of this plug-in are used by the Air Force Pictogram of the Republic of Korea Air Force and can be downloaded free from Gongnaedi (https://afplay2.tistory.com/).

plugins.name: Groupify
plugins.description:
This plugin allows you to group and align variants within your components and finely adjust the distances between groups.


-----


Instructions:

  1. Select the component with multiple variants and properties you want to orginize.
  2. After starting the plugin, you will see a list of all the properties of the component with their values. For each property, you can customize the appearance of variants.


Grouping

You can group variants by property into columns or rows.


Order of rows/columns

To change the order of rows or columns, drag the corresponding property values.


Paddings

You can customize the padding within all four sides.


Video instruction here.
plugins.tagline: A plugin that groups and aligns variants in components and adjusts distances between them

plugins.name: Page numbers for Figma Slides
plugins.description:
🚀 Take Page Numbering in Figma Slides to the Next Level!

The original Page Numbers for Figma Slides plugin made it effortless to add and update slide numbers in just one click. Now, with the latest version, you get even more control and customization—making it a powerful alternative to Figma’s built-in page numbering.


🔥 What’s New?

  1. Custom Positioning: Place page numbers exactly where you want with adjustable alignment and offsets.
  2. Customizable prefix: Add a prefix (e.g., "Slide" or "Page") before the slide number.
  3. Total slides count: Show the total slide count.
  4. Include or Exclude skipped slides: Option to count or exclude skipped slides from numbering.
  5. Update in One Click: Already have page numbers? Refresh them instantly to reflect any new slide additions or changes.
  6. Individual Slide Support: Only need a page number on a single slide? No problem—insert and update page numbers slide by slide if needed.


How It Works

  1. Insert Page Number to Slide: Adds a page number to the currently selected slide.
  2. Or Insert Page Number to All Slides: Quickly populates all your slides with page numbers.
  3. Update Page Numbers: Instantly re-numbers all slides, so they’re always in sync with your deck’s order.


💡 Why Choose This Over Figma’s Default Page Numbers?

Figma’s native page numbers are great, but this plugin gives you full control over placement, format, and styling—so your slides look exactly the way you want.


Get started now and keep your presentations polished, professional, and perfectly numbered!


Happy designing and presenting!

accepted.name: Shreyansh Kotak
accepted.description: As a Product Designer, I'm passionate about enhancing user experiences. Focused on UX design, design systems, and no-code tools.

plugins.tagline: One click update page numbers for your Figma Slides
